code: // build a UIView for the header
//  we have a handy method to build module UI easily, this includes:
//  we will use the one for background images
//  any UIView will work here for headerView, not just a TMModuleHeaderView
let headerDisplay = TMTicketsModule.HeaderDisplay(view: headerView as UIView)
// build action buttons that open a webpage
title: "Venue Info", // what user will see, you should localize this text
callbackValue: "venueInfo", // non-localized value, for your own code/analytics
return TMTicketsModule(identifier: "com.myDemoApp.venueInfo", // a name unique to your app
actionButtons: [actionButton]) // you can show 0 to 3 buttons

configure with background image and QR code
optional delegate to implement prebuilt and custom
to be rendered on the Tickets listing page
create a custom module to be displayed underneath the user’s list of Tickets on the Tickets listing page
configure with Audio/Video content (typically a movie file)
configure with background image and 2D barcode code
Implementation of Ticketmaster post-purchase functionality such as viewing purchased Events, Tickets, and Barcodes.
